name: Could You Pass A Torch?
description:
---------------------CONTROLS--------------------

E - Throw Torch / Give Torch

Q - Recover Torch / Deny Torch

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

---------------------DESCRIPTION--------------------

Several villagers have become lost in the nearby cave. As a nice monster, you find this to be the perfect opportunity to win them over. Bring them torches so that they can find their way out, or leave them without any light. It's up to you on whether you save them or treat them the way they once treated you.

So, will you pass a torch?

---------------------CREDITS--------------------

Dominic Morales - Programming, Art

Raou - Art

SoundEffectsFactory - Cave Ambience

---------------------DISCLAIMER--------------------

This game was created for the WeeklyGameJam week 168: Pass The Torch.

Everything was made in a week, so it may have some  bugs/issues. Feel free to tell me about them in the comments.
